item.description:
Description:
Who Is Creating the Future of Business? And Is it Sustainable?
Fast Company magazine invites you to join the conversation over a
complimentary lunch. Nine years ago, EcoFish, a 2007 FAST50* honoree,
became the voice for eco-friendly fisheries around the world. With
projected sales in 2007 reaching $5 million, it seems to be working.
Senior projects editor Bill Breen will interview EcoFish president
Henry Lovejoy for insight into his success.

*The FAST50 is an annual feature that recognizes the people and companies
that are having the most impact on how we will work and live in the future.

Cost:
Free

RSVP:
Space is limited. RSVP to FAST50@fastcompany.com.
item.name: Fast Company's Sustainable Luncheon Panel & Discussion Waltham
